class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        from sortedcontainers import SortedList
        sl = SortedList([i for i in range(n)])
        # print(sl)
        ans = []
        for u, v in queries:
            l = sl.bisect_left(u)
            r = sl.bisect_left(v)
            # print(l, r)
            if l >= len(sl) or sl[l] != u or r >= len(sl) or sl[r] != v:
                ans.append(len(sl)-1)
                continue
            
            cnt = r - l - 1
            for _ in range(cnt):
                sl.pop(l+1)
            # print(sl)
            ans.append(len(sl)-1)
            
        return ans
